skillTree.name: Walking Larder
skillTree.description: More flesh for the feasting means more punishing magic for Skrag's foolish enemies!

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve change: +10% when increasing
Winds of Magic power reserve change: +20% when increasing
Winds of Magic power reserve change: +30% when increasing

skillTree.name: Tolerance to Toxins
skillTree.description: Regular consumption of rotten meat and toxins are the staples of a healthy Ogre diet.

skillTree.name: Horrific Stench
skillTree.description: The reeking odour seeping from this one's every pore would offend any creature with a nose, and several without.

skillTree.name: Toothy Gnoblars
skillTree.description: As menial slaves to the Butcher's bidding, these Gnoblars must find him meat for the pot, or wind up in it themselves.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve change: +5% when increasing

skillTree.name: Lookout Gnoblars
skillTree.description: Stumpy and short-witted as they are, these Gnoblars have an eye on the sky at all times.

skillTree.name: Lucky Gnoblars
skillTree.description: It never hurts to keep your lucky Gnoblar with you, just in case.

skillTree.name: Blessed by the Great Maw
skillTree.description: Puny magicks are nothing in the face of the Great Maw's endless hunger.

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say noâ€¦

effects.description: When normally killed in battle, this Lord will be wounded instead

skillTree.name: Renowned Feastmaster
skillTree.description: "Fetch me more bones! This meal could use a little crunch!"

skillTree.name: Prophet of the Great Maw
skillTree.description: Not even the darkest corruption can escape the Maw's devouring influence.

skillTree.name: Emissary of the Great Maw
skillTree.description: The Slaughtermaster speaks as the Great Maw wills, and all of the faithful listen well.

skillTree.name: Poisonmaster
skillTree.description: "Kill a creature with poison and it seeps into their skin â€“ gives that yummy flesh an extra kick!"

effects.description:
Attrition: -20% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Grand Slaughterer
skillTree.description: The best part of such rampant slaughter is the gory feast that follows.

skillTree.name: Wyssan's Wildform
skillTree.description: The spellcaster unleashes the beast within, using its fury to transform allies into bestial forms.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Wyssan's Wildform"
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Wyssan's Wildform Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Wyssan's Wildform Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Wild Heart
skillTree.description: The spellcaster attunes the magic of the wild, channelling its ancient and arcane power.

skillTree.name: Flock of Doom
skillTree.description: With a mighty bellow, the caster invokes Corvus the Crow Lord, summoning his servants to peck at the foe's eyes.

ui_effects.description: Strong vs 25 men unit or above
Strong vs 25 men unit or above
Strong vs 25 men unit or above
Strong vs 25 men unit or above
Strong vs 25 men unit or above

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Flock of Doom"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Flock of Doom Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Flock of Doom Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Pann's Impenetrable Pelt
skillTree.description: Calling upon the beast spirits of the wild, the caster sheathes vulnerable flesh in unyielding fur and hide.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Pann's Impenetrable Pelt"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Pann's Impenetrable Pelt Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Pann's Impenetrable Pelt Upgraded"

skillTree.name: The Amber Spear
skillTree.description: Sounding a gnarled horn, the caster summons a glowing amber spear and hurls it at the foe with uncanny accuracy.

ui_effects.description: Requires line of sight to the target
Requires line of sight to the target
Requires line of sight to the target
Requires line of sight to the target
Requires line of sight to the target

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "The Amber Spear"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "The Amber Spear Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "The Amber Spear Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Meat Cleaver
skillTree.description: Once the slaughter begins, every foe is but meat yet to be carved.

skillTree.name: Transformation of Kadon
skillTree.description: Kadon, a master of forms, was able to shift his shape into anything he chose. This mastery is used to summon a Manticore, as if Kadon himself fights for you.

ui_effects.description: Spawned unit fights in this battle only

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -6 for "Transformation of Kadon"

skillTree.name: The Curse of Anraheir
skillTree.description: Nebulous nature spirits assail the foe, clawing at them with hands not nearly as insubstantial as they appear.

effects.description: Overcast spell: "The Curse of Anraheir Upgraded"
Overcast spell: "The Curse of Anraheir Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "The Curse of Anraheir"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "The Curse of Anraheir Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "The Curse of Anraheir Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Earthing
skillTree.description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.

skillTree.name: Meat Reserves
skillTree.description: Where this one goes, his meat-pot goes too, as a bounteous reserve for his spells.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve change: +15% when increasing

skillTree.name: Inspiring Presence
skillTree.description: There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +75
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Bull Charge
skillTree.description: When an Ogre charges, the ground itself begins to quake. As it should.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +2 for Ogre Bulls units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Ogre Bulls units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +8 for Ogre Bulls units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Ogre Bulls units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +12 for Ogre Bulls units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Scrappy Fighters
skillTree.description: Though their intelligence is as pitiful as their physique, one would be a fool not to fear the Gnoblars when massed in numbers.

effects.description:
Melee defence: +2 for Gnoblars units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +4 for Gnoblars units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +6 for Gnoblars units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Beast Riders
skillTree.description: If there's one thing more horrifying than being rushed by a hulking, bloodthirsty beast, it's being rushed by that same creature riding on the back of another equally hulking, bloodthirsty beast.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +6% for Mournfang Cavalry and Crushers units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +9% for Mournfang Cavalry and Crushers units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +9 for Mournfang Cavalry and Crushers units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +12% for Mournfang Cavalry and Crushers units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +12 for Mournfang Cavalry and Crushers units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Tools of Destruction
skillTree.description: The Ogres' true firepower is as destructive and indelicate as the Ogres themselves.

effects.description:
Missile strength: +4% for Leadbelchers, Gnoblar Scraplauncher and Ironblasters units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +12% for Leadbelchers, Gnoblar Scraplauncher and Ironblaster units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +6% for Leadbelchers, Gnoblar Scraplauncher and Ironblasters units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +20% for Leadbelchers, Gnoblar Scraplauncher and Ironblaster units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +8% for Leadbelchers, Gnoblar Scraplauncher and Ironblasters units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Best Eaterz
skillTree.description: Even ferocious brutes like the Ironguts and Maneaters fight harder in the presence of a worthy leader.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +2 for Ironguts and Maneaters units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Ironguts and Maneaters units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +4 for Ironguts and Maneaters units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Ironguts and Maneaters units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +6 for Ironguts and Maneaters units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Beasts of the Mountains
skillTree.description: What the monstrous creatures of the mountains lack in guile, they more than make up for in their stubborn reluctance to die.

effects.description:
Charge bonus: +4 for Sabretusk Pack, Stonehorns, Gorgers and Giant units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +9 for Sabretusk Pack, Stonehorn, Gorgers, and Giant units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +8 for Sabretusk Pack, Stonehorns, Gorgers and Giant units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +12 for Sabretusk Pack, Stonehorn, Gorgers, and Giant units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +12 for Sabretusk Pack, Stonehorns, Gorgers and Giant units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Richly Rewarded
skillTree.description: To the most brutal, vicious killer go the richest spoils.

effects.description:
Armour: +10 for Ironguts, Gnoblars, and Ogre Bulls units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +6 for Ironguts, Gnoblars and Ogre Bulls units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +12% for Ironguts, Gnoblars and Ogre Bulls units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Continuous Volley
skillTree.description: When pelting a helpless enemy with heavy projectiles is so much fun, why bother stopping?

effects.description:
Speed: +10% for Gnoblar Trappers, Leadbelchers, Gnoblar Scraplauncher and Ironblasters units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Range: +10% for Gnoblar Trappers, Leadbelchers, Gnoblar Scraplauncher and Ironblasters units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +15% for Gnoblar Trappers, Leadbelchers, Gnoblar Scraplauncher and Ironblasters units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Trained Beasts
skillTree.description: When fearsome, brute strength is combined with terrifying speed, the petty weaklings among the enemy can only wet themselves in fear.

effects.description:
Leadership: +5 for Mournfang Cavalry, Crushers, Stonehorn and Sabretusk Pack units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +10% for Mournfang Cavalry, Crushers, Stonehorn and Sabretusk Pack units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +7 for Mournfang Cavalry, Crushers, Stonehorn and Sabretusk Pack units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Ravenous Fighters
skillTree.description: Driven by ravenous hunger, the Maneaters feast on the flesh of the fallen.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +7 for Maneaters, Gorgers and Giant units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +10% for Maneaters, Gorgers and Giant units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: 15% for Maneaters, Gorgers and Giant units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Route Marcher
skillTree.description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.

skillTree.name: Healer
skillTree.description: The mysterious powers of the Great Maw can heal even the deepest of wounds.

skillTree.name: Mawtooth
skillTree.description: Ogres flock to this Butcher's camp, eager for the chance to witness the Great Maw's malevolent power.

skillTree.name: Devouring Maw
skillTree.description: This ravening Ogre Lord is but a mere symbol of his god, whose cancerous power reigns over the Mountains of Mourn.

skillTree.name: Brutish Enforcers
skillTree.description: The grumblings of unrest tend to quiet when under threat of being crushed and eaten.

skillTree.name: Reader of Portents
skillTree.description: Through a bloody haze of visions, the Butcher sees a great many terrible wonders.

skillTree.name: Lightning Strike
skillTree.description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.name: Quartermaster
skillTree.description: A good quartermaster can ration equipment and foodstuffs efficiently, making supplies last longer.

skillTree.name: Master of Meat
skillTree.description: Flesh, limbs, blood and bone â€“ it all goes into the meat-pot!

skillTree.name: Diviner of Omens
skillTree.description: Wealth is much easier to come by when the omens are guiding your path.

skillTree.name: Renowned & Feared
skillTree.description: This Lord's many deeds - both on and off the battlefield - have brought them renown among their allies and made them feared by their enemies.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors

backgroundSkills.name: Aggressive
backgroundSkills.description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.

backgroundSkills.name: Confident
backgroundSkills.description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

backgroundSkills.name: Cunning
backgroundSkills.description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +10%
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.name: Determined
backgroundSkills.description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

backgroundSkills.name: Disciplined
backgroundSkills.description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.

backgroundSkills.name: Fleet-Footed
backgroundSkills.description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fightâ€¦ or when trying to get away afterwards!

backgroundSkills.name: Intelligent
backgroundSkills.description: Sharp minds make sharp blades sharper still.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +5% chance of wounding aggressors

backgroundSkills.name: Knowledgeable
backgroundSkills.description: What this being doesn't know probably isn't worth knowing, so deep is their interest in the world and its ways.

backgroundSkills.name: Strategist
backgroundSkills.description: This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.

backgroundSkills.name: Tactician
backgroundSkills.description: Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.

backgroundSkills.name: Tough
backgroundSkills.description: Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.

backgroundSkills.name: Weapon Master
backgroundSkills.description: If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.

backgroundSkills.name: Perceptive
backgroundSkills.description: Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

backgroundSkills.name: Deboner
backgroundSkills.description: Butchery is an art. This one knows how to extract every last morsel worth eating from a carcass, leaving only bones behind them.

backgroundSkills.name: Farter
backgroundSkills.description: Though they risk killing the Ogres directly behind them, those fighters who like it spicy can propel themselves further with gassy emanations following a hearty meal.

backgroundSkills.name: Flabby
backgroundSkills.description: The more meat you eat, the stronger and fatter you become, and therefore the harder you are to move from your chosen position.

backgroundSkills.name: Big Daddy
backgroundSkills.description: There may or may not be a height difference between this one and his Ogreish colleagues, but in stature on the battlefield the divergence is most stark.

backgroundSkills.name: Maw Preacher
backgroundSkills.description: "Remember, lads, when Great Maw came 'e ate the night, shook the ground and burnt it with fire. That is 'oo we serve, not sum uvver power."

ui_effects.description: Strong vs 25 men unit or above
